content: I think Whistler Blackcomb sounds like a great fit for us. We're all pretty outgoing and love to have fun, so the lively atmosphere and après-ski scene would be perfect. Also, I've heard the skiing there is amazing, which is a must for us. By the way, I've been checking the weather forecast for the mountains lately, and I'm hoping the snow conditions will be good by December when we plan to go. Do you think I should be worried about the snow conditions that time of year?
